text:
@SpeakerPelosi I hope the Republicans BLOCK the DEMOCRATS HEROS BILL. 
Back to work. Payroll tax cut. 
The Wuhan China virus Covid19 didn't kill the millions of Antifa, Anarchists, Protesters and Rioters. So now 
Democrats see through it and are blaming Democrats for not opening up the Country.
